lead_paragraph: BROWN--Dr. Roscoe C.,Jr. The members of One Hundred Black Men, Inc, mourn the loss of Dr. Roscoe C. Brown, Jr., one of our founding members and former Presidents. As one of the original Tuskegee Airmen, former President of Bronx Community College, CUNY Executive and a talk show host, Dr. Brown was a living legend, and not only a fixture in Black History but a great American icon. We will miss his fierce leadership and limitless courage. Our sympathies are with his family. Michael Garner, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BROWN, DR. ROSCOE C.
